sagemod:About_Clark.NAME: About Clark
sagemod:About_Clark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage two times. NL Costs 1 less [E] per Frail you have.

sagemod:AbstractSageCard.NAME: Abstract Sage Card
sagemod:AbstractSageCard.DESCRIPTION: ABSTRACT CLASS! THIS SHOULD NEVER BE DISPLAYED!
sagemod:AbstractSageCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: These values are for speech bubbles and updating the brew variable
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can only play this if I have no Flight!
I can only play this if I am flying!
I can only play this if I have a potion!

sagemod:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
sagemod:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Air. NL Gain [E] and lose !M! Flight at the start of each turn.

sagemod:Alchemy_Expert.NAME: Alchemy Expert
sagemod:Alchemy_Expert.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, gain !M! Artifact.
sagemod:Alchemy_Expert.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you use a potion, gain !M! Artifact.

sagemod:Anti_Ancient_Attack.NAME: Anti Ancient Attack
sagemod:Anti_Ancient_Attack.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Artifact. NL Then deal !D! damage per Artifact the enemy has.

sagemod:Armor_Brew.NAME: Armor Brew
sagemod:Armor_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Brew a Block Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! turns.
sagemod:Armor_Brew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Brew an upgraded Block Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! turns.

sagemod:Blurry.NAME: Blurry
sagemod:Blurry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !sagemod:MISC! Temporary_HP. NL Gain !M! Temporary_HP per Frail you have. NL Exhaust.

sagemod:Bookworm.NAME: Bookworm
sagemod:Bookworm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an X cost card, Refund 1 Energy.
sagemod:Bookworm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an X cost card, gain [E] .

sagemod:Bouncing_Strike.NAME: Bouncing Strike
sagemod:Bouncing_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !sagemod:MISC! Frail. NL Gain !M! Flight. Deal damage equal to the sum of your Frail and Flight.
sagemod:Bouncing_Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !sagemod:MISC! Frail. NL Gain !M! Flight. Deal damage equal to the product of your Frail and Flight.

sagemod:Burning_Flask.NAME: Burning Flask
sagemod:Burning_Flask.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. If you carry potions, discard one at random and deal !M! extra damage.

sagemod:Cane_Strike.NAME: Cane Strike
sagemod:Cane_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals double damage if you are Frail.

sagemod:Catch_Me_If_You_Can.NAME: Catch Me If You Can
sagemod:Catch_Me_If_You_Can.DESCRIPTION: Air. Prevent the next !M! times you would lose Flight until the start of your next turn.

sagemod:Crank.NAME: Crank
sagemod:Crank.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Artifact, draw !M! card.
sagemod:Crank.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw cards equal to the enemy's Artifact.

sagemod:Cultist_Form.NAME: Cultist Form
sagemod:Cultist_Form.DESCRIPTION: Lose !sagemod:MISC! Flight. NL Apply 1 Disoriented to a random enemy !M! times.

sagemod:Deadly_Contraption.NAME: Deadly Contraption
sagemod:Deadly_Contraption.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain !M! Artifact. For !sagemod:MISC! turns, enemies lose 1 HP per Artifact on them.

sagemod:Energetic_Brew.NAME: Energetic Brew
sagemod:Energetic_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Brew an Energy Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! turns.
sagemod:Energetic_Brew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Brew an upgraded Energy Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! turns.

sagemod:Extra_Portion.NAME: Extra Portion
sagemod:Extra_Portion.DESCRIPTION: The next potion is applied twice this turn.
sagemod:Extra_Portion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next !M! potions are applied twice this turn.

sagemod:Fire_Brew.NAME: Fire Brew
sagemod:Fire_Brew.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Brew a Fire Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! turns.
sagemod:Fire_Brew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Brew an upgraded Fire Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! turns.

sagemod:Fly.NAME: Fly
sagemod:Fly.DESCRIPTION: If you are flying: NL Gain !B! Block. NL Otherwise: NL Gain !M! Flight.

sagemod:Flying_Cauldron.NAME: Flying Cauldron
sagemod:Flying_Cauldron.DESCRIPTION: Air. NL Gain !M! Brewing. NL Exhaust.
sagemod:Flying_Cauldron.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you are flying: NL Gain !M! Brewing. NL Otherwise: NL Gain !M! Flight. NL Exhaust.

sagemod:Folded_Carpet.NAME: Folded Carpet
sagemod:Folded_Carpet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block per Flight you have.

sagemod:Gearwheel_Master.NAME: Gearwheel Master
sagemod:Gearwheel_Master.DESCRIPTION: EVERYBODY gains !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

sagemod:Grounded_Strike.NAME: Grounded Strike
sagemod:Grounded_Strike.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Flight. NL Deal !D! damage.

sagemod:How_To_Amuse_Sneckos.NAME: How To Amuse Sneckos
sagemod:How_To_Amuse_Sneckos.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Flight. NL Draw X cards. NL Refund !stslib:refund!.
sagemod:How_To_Amuse_Sneckos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Flight. NL Draw X cards. NL Refund !stslib:refund!.

sagemod:How_To_Charm_A_Sentry.NAME: How To Charm A Sentry
sagemod:How_To_Charm_A_Sentry.DESCRIPTION: Deal X times !D! damage. The enemy gains X Artifact.

sagemod:How_To_Feed_Apes.NAME: How To Feed Apes
sagemod:How_To_Feed_Apes.DESCRIPTION: Brew one of the NL possible Potions NL in !sagemod:BRW! -X turns. NL Exhaust.

sagemod:How_To_Greet_Byrds.NAME: How To Greet Byrds
sagemod:How_To_Greet_Byrds.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Set your Flight to X. NL Exhaust.
sagemod:How_To_Greet_Byrds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain X Flight. NL Exhaust.

sagemod:How_To_Murder_Ants.NAME: How To Murder Ants
sagemod:How_To_Murder_Ants.DESCRIPTION: Air. NL Deal X damage to a random enemy !M! times.

sagemod:How_To_Poke_At_Slimes.NAME: How To Poke At Slimes
sagemod:How_To_Poke_At_Slimes.DESCRIPTION: Deal X damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Frail. NL Refund !stslib:refund!.

sagemod:How_To_Wake_Lyons.NAME: How To Wake Lyons
sagemod:How_To_Wake_Lyons.DESCRIPTION: Brew a NL Steroid Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! -X turns. NL Exhaust.
sagemod:How_To_Wake_Lyons.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Brew a NL Steroid Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! -X turns.

sagemod:How_To_Warm_Elephants.NAME: How To Warm Elephants
sagemod:How_To_Warm_Elephants.DESCRIPTION: Brew an NL Explosive Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! -X turns.
sagemod:How_To_Warm_Elephants.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Brew an NL upgraded Explosive Potion NL in !sagemod:BRW! -X turns.

sagemod:Lecture.NAME: Lecture
sagemod:Lecture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage per X cost card played this combat.

sagemod:Let_It_Go.NAME: Let It Go
sagemod:Let_It_Go.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand. Gain Flight equal to its cost. NL Exhaust.
sagemod:Let_It_Go.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards from your hand. Gain Flight equal to their costs. NL Exhaust.

sagemod:Light_Weighted.NAME: Light-Weighted
sagemod:Light_Weighted.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Frail. NL Gain that much Flight. NL Exhaust.
sagemod:Light_Weighted.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all Frail. NL Gain that much NL Flight + !M!. NL Exhaust.

sagemod:Lunchtime.NAME: Lunchtime!
sagemod:Lunchtime.DESCRIPTION: Air. NL Lose !M! Flight and brew all potions immediately.

sagemod:Mechanics_Break.NAME: Mechanics Break!
sagemod:Mechanics_Break.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The target enemy gains !M! Artifact.

sagemod:Meditation.NAME: Meditation
sagemod:Meditation.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Flight. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

sagemod:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
sagemod:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Brew a Swift Potion in !sagemod:BRW! turns.
sagemod:Momentum.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Brew an upgraded Swift Potion in !sagemod:BRW! turns.

sagemod:On_Fire.NAME: On Fire
sagemod:On_Fire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! cards in a single turn, obtain a Fire Potion.
sagemod:On_Fire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! cards in a single turn, obtain an upgraded Fire Potion.

sagemod:On_The_Head.NAME: On The Head
sagemod:On_The_Head.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are flying: NL Draw !M! card NL and gain [E].

sagemod:Perpetuum_Mobile.NAME: Perpetuum Mobile
sagemod:Perpetuum_Mobile.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Play it for free if it costs !sagemod:MISC!.
sagemod:Perpetuum_Mobile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Play it for free if it costs !sagemod:MISC! or X.

sagemod:Pincer_Attack.NAME: Pincer Attack
sagemod:Pincer_Attack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is increased per Artifact the enemy has.
sagemod:Pincer_Attack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is increased twice per Artifact the enemy has.

sagemod:Pincer_Repair.NAME: Pincer Repair
sagemod:Pincer_Repair.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The enemy gains NL !M! Artifact.

sagemod:Potion_Explosion.NAME: Potion Explosion
sagemod:Potion_Explosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Repeat this once per potion you used this turn.

sagemod:Potion_Trance.NAME: Potion Trance
sagemod:Potion_Trance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card whenever you use a potion this turn. You cannot gain energy this turn.
sagemod:Potion_Trance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards whenever you use a potion this turn. You cannot gain energy this turn.

sagemod:Pour_Tar_Pitch.NAME: Pour Tar Pitch
sagemod:Pour_Tar_Pitch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you are flying, this affects ALL enemies.

sagemod:Prey.NAME: Prey
sagemod:Prey.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If this kills an enemy with more max HP than you, gain !M! max HP and remove this card from your deck.

sagemod:Quackster.NAME: Quackster
sagemod:Quackster.DESCRIPTION: Brew a random Potion in !sagemod:BRW! turns. NL Exhaust.
sagemod:Quackster.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Brew a random Potion in !sagemod:BRW! turns.

sagemod:Read_The_Riot_Act.NAME: Read The Riot Act
sagemod:Read_The_Riot_Act.DESCRIPTION: Choose an X cost card from your draw pile and play it. NL Exhaust
sagemod:Read_The_Riot_Act.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an X cost card from your draw pile and play it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose an X cost card to play.

sagemod:Refine.NAME: Refine
sagemod:Refine.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random unupgraded potion you are holding. NL Exhaust.
sagemod:Refine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all unupgraded potions you are holding. NL Exhaust.

sagemod:Riches.NAME: Riches!!!
sagemod:Riches.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use an upgraded potion, obtain a random unupgraded potion.

sagemod:Rickety_Defense.NAME: Rickety Defense
sagemod:Rickety_Defense.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, set your Block to your Frail if you have more Frail than Block.
sagemod:Rickety_Defense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, set your Block to your Frail if you have more Frail than Block.

sagemod:Rock_Oil.NAME: Rock Oil
sagemod:Rock_Oil.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you use a Potion while this card is in your hand, gain !B! Block.

sagemod:Shining_Powder.NAME: Shining Powder
sagemod:Shining_Powder.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you use a Potion while this card is in your hand, gain [E].
sagemod:Shining_Powder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Whenever you use a Potion while this card is in your hand, gain [E] [E].

sagemod:Step_Back.NAME: Step Back
sagemod:Step_Back.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you are flying: NL Refund !sagemod:MISC!. NL Otherwise: NL Gain !M! Flight.

sagemod:Study.NAME: Study
sagemod:Study.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put !sagemod:MISC! card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
sagemod:Study.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL You may put !sagemod:MISC! card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: put on top of your draw pile.

sagemod:Swoop_Down.NAME: Swoop Down
sagemod:Swoop_Down.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage per Flight you have. NL Then lose !M! Flight.
sagemod:Swoop_Down.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage per Flight you have.

sagemod:Taste_This_One.NAME: Taste This One
sagemod:Taste_This_One.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a potion, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

sagemod:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
sagemod:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Block per Artifact on the field + !sagemod:MISC! NL (gains !B! Block).
sagemod:Tinker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Artifact. NL Gain 1 Block per Artifact on the field + !sagemod:MISC! NL (gains !B! Block).

sagemod:Trixter.NAME: Trixter
sagemod:Trixter.DESCRIPTION: Refund all energy used when playing your next card.

sagemod:Turn_Around.NAME: Turn Around
sagemod:Turn_Around.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Frail. NL Deal !D! damage per Frail you have.

sagemod:Undermine.NAME: Undermine
sagemod:Undermine.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Artifact to ALL enemies. NL When you attack an enemy, they take extra damage equal to the Artifact on them.

sagemod:Vigorous_Body.NAME: Vigorous Body
sagemod:Vigorous_Body.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Artifact of you gets triggered, gain !M! Strength.
sagemod:Vigorous_Body.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Artifact of you or an enemy gets triggered, gain !M! Strength.
